blogPost.excerpt:
With each breath we have the opportunity to begin again, to arrive in the present moment. In this foundational phase of this journey I invite you to see each new practice as a new arrival.

Accept and celebrate that each day will be different. Some days you will have more energy than others. Some days it will seem as though the universe is supporting you to show up, eagerly, and fully. Some days your brain will* make it very hard for you to arrive, and it may seem like the exterior is winning over your interior goals. 

Make your #1 goal to show up on the mat. 

Self care is learning the practice of meeting your self each day, learning about who you really are, and continuing to arrive to devote to the process of self discovery, not perfectionism. 

With each breath, a new arrival. 

It’s a powerful tool, and one we are going to cultivate and celebrate together. 

Let me know how Day 2 goes for you in the comment section down below!

- - - - - - - - - - 

❤️SUBSCRIBE to the YWA channel for free yoga videos every week and to support high-quality free yoga for all! ❤️
https://www.youtube.com/user/yogawithadriene?sub_confirmation=1

- - - - - - - - - -

blogPost.body:
With each breath we have the opportunity to begin again, to arrive in the present moment. In this foundational phase of this journey I invite you to see each new practice as a new arrival.

Accept and celebrate that each day will be different. Some days you will have more energy than others. Some days it will seem as though the universe is supporting you to show up, eagerly, and fully. Some days your brain will* make it very hard for you to arrive, and it may seem like the exterior is winning over your interior goals. 

Make your #1 goal to show up on the mat. 

Self care is learning the practice of meeting your self each day, learning about who you really are, and continuing to arrive to devote to the process of self discovery, not perfectionism. 

With each breath, a new arrival. 

It’s a powerful tool, and one we are going to cultivate and celebrate together. 

Let me know how Day 2 goes for you in the comment section down below!

localize.title: 第二天-到达|呼吸-30天瑜伽之旅
localize.description:
随着每一次呼吸，我们都有机会重新开始，到达当下。在这个旅程的基础阶段，我邀请你们把每一次新的修行都看作是新的到来。

接受并庆祝每一天都将是不同的。有些日子，你会比其他人精力更充沛。总有一天，似乎宇宙在支持你，热切而充分地展现你。有些日子，你的大脑会让你很难达到目标，似乎外部的目标正在战胜你的内在目标。

让你的头号目标出现在垫子上。

自我照顾是学习每天与自己相遇的实践，了解真正的你是谁，并继续到达，致力于自我发现的过程，而不是完美主义。

每一次呼吸，都有新的到来。

这是一个强大的工具，我们将一起培养和庆祝。

在下面的评论区让我知道你第二天过得怎么样！



❤️每周订阅YWA频道的免费瑜伽视频，并为所有人提供高质量的免费瑜伽支持！❤️
https://www.youtube.com/user/yogawithadriene?sub_confirmation=1

https://fwfg.com
加入寻找感觉良好的活动，并访问700多个视频，包括所有级别的瑜伽和冥想。探索日常实践、研讨会、深入学习、每周或每月问责制系列，以及与独一无二的全球社区建立联系的机会。这是您的瑜伽、创意、健康和所有FWFG的一站式商店。免费试用7天！





欲了解更多信息，请访问www.yegawith adriene.com。
▶︎Instagram：@adrienelouise
瑜伽推特：@▶︎adriene
▶︎脸书：和阿德里安一起瑜伽

next.excerpt:
TommyInnit & Tubbo watch his old, unseen Minecraft videos. This was insane. 

Follow my Twitter - @tommyinnit

Follow my Instagram - @tommyinnitt

Edited by Tommy + Big Man Editor Larry ( @TalentLacking )

This is my Second Channel where I post extra content & videos that I love making but wouldn't be as awesome, cool or funny on the TommyInnit channel! There is still some Dream SMP Minecraft & some of The Funniest Minecraft Videos Ever... and even some vlogs like the time I met Wilbur Soot in real life... it is awesome & I have lots of laughs! I am not crazy
next.title: Watching my old videos.

localize.title: 看我以前的录像带。
localize.description:
TommyInnit&Tubbo在看他看不见的老视频“我的世界”。这太疯狂了。

关注我的推特-@tommyinnit

关注我的Instagram-@tommyinnitt

编辑：汤米+大块头编辑拉里(@TalentLacking)

这是我的第二个频道，我会在TommyInnit频道上发布额外的内容&我喜欢制作的视频，但不会像TommyInnit频道那样令人敬畏、酷或有趣！仍然有一些梦想SMP“我的世界”&一些有史以来最有趣的“我的世界”视频…甚至还有一些博客，比如我在现实生活中遇到威尔伯·索特的时候……太棒了&我有很多笑声！我没有疯

localize.title: 看我以前的錄像帶。
localize.description:
TommyInnit&Tubbo在看他看不見的老視頻“我的世界”。這太瘋狂了。

關注我的推特-@tommyinnit

關注我的Instagram-@tommyinnitt

編輯：湯米+大塊頭編輯拉里(@TalentLacking)

這是我的第二個頻道，我會在TommyInnit頻道上發佈額外的內容&我喜歡製作的視頻，但不會像TommyInnit頻道那樣令人敬畏、酷或有趣！仍然有一些夢想SMP“我的世界”&一些有史以來最有趣的“我的世界”視頻…甚至還有一些博客，比如我在現實生活中遇到威爾伯·索特的時候……太棒了&我有很多笑聲！我沒有瘋
